metadata.dc:author: Gálvez García, A M
metadata.dc:description: This work describes a new surgical procedure to repair the lip defects produced after malignant tumors ablation, consisting in the orbicularis oris muscle flap and its use for a VY plastic.
metadata.dc:title: Nueva técnica quirúrgica para la reconstrucción de defectos parciales en los labios tras la resección tumoral: el colgajo "en compuerta" (the lip "hatch" flap).
[New surgical technic for the reconstruction of partial lip defects following tumor resection: the lip hatch flap].
